name: Orbitarr Episode Tracker
description: Automatically track watched episodes to your Orbitarr API. Triggers on both playback completion and manual marking.
overview: Track episode watch events to Orbitarr API

versions.changelog:
- Fix configuration page not loading
- Fix embedded resource path for HTML

Initial release
- Track episodes on playback completion
- Track episodes on manual marking
- Configurable API endpoint and user ID
- Uses TMDB/TVDB IDs
